overview: In 19th Century France, a young Bram Stoker is captured by a man-hating, all-female cult of thong bikini wearers. Aided by flesh-eating rats, the warrior women raid the lairs of evil men and punish them. Our hero must decide between his wish to escape the dangerous cult and his love for one of its members.
tagline: The secret society of beautiful women... Erotic rituals... Leaving will tear you apart!
title: Burial of the Rats
